contentencoded: With emergency funding drying up, the Greek government sends a letter to creditors saying it might accept terms of a bailout. More on that. We'll also talk to Allan Sloan of the Washington Post about how the strong dollar is ironically helping U.S. businesses.

description: A possible deal in Greece, and the strong U.S. dollar.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, July 1, 2015

title: PODCAST: The strong dollar
